dirty.name: Dirty
jokes:
Q. What did the penis say to the condom?
A. "Cover me. I'm going in."

Ted and Julie go to bed with each other for the first time.
Julie: "I should warn you, Ted: I've got acute angina."
Ted: "Your breasts aren't bad either."

What’s the difference between a G-spot and a golf ball?

A guy will actually search for a golf ball.

Why was the guitar teacher arrested?

For fingering a minor.

What’s the difference between a tire and 365 used condoms?

One’s a Goodyear. The other’s a great year.

Why does Santa Claus have such a big sack?

He only comes once a year.

What’s the difference between a hooker and a drug dealer?

A hooker can wash her crack and resell it.

What do the Mafia and pussies have in common?

One slip of the tongue, and you’re in deep shit.

What’s the best part about sex with 28-year-olds?

There are twenty of them.

How did Burger King get Dairy Queen pregnant?

He forgot to wrap his whopper.

Wanna hear a joke about my dick?

Nevermind. It’s too long.

What does it mean if a man remembers the color of a woman’s eyes after a first date?

She’s got small tits.

What did Cinderella do when she got to the ball?

She gagged.

What’s the difference between your wife and your job?

After five years, your job will still suck.

Why did God give men penises?

So they’d have at least one way to shut a woman up.

What’s the difference between anal and oral sex?

Oral sex makes your day. Anal makes your hole weak.

What did the penis say to the vagina?

Don’t make me come in there!

What’s the difference between a pick-pocket and a peeping tom?

One snatches your watch. The other watches your snatch.

How is life like a penis?

Your girlfriend makes it hard.
My dad sent me to a psychiatrist for wearing his bra again.
Children in the back seats of cars cause accidents, but accidents in the back seats of cars cause children.
My girlfriends dad asked me what I do. Apparently, "your daughter" wasn't the right answer.
Men approve of premarital sex until daughters are born.
I think sex is better than logic, but I can't prove it.
Life is sexually transmitted.
Do you sell hot dogs? Because you know how to make a wiener stand.

dark.name: Dark
jokes:
Why is it so hard to break up with a Japanese girlfriend?
You have to drop the bomb twice before she gets it.
I don't know where I stand on abortion. I like killing babies, but I don't like giving women a choice.
Dark humor is like food. Not everybody gets it.

"What's the deal with airline food?"
Said the Malaysian shark.

What do 9 out of 10 people enjoy?
Gang rape

Whats the difference between a terrorist training camp and an orphanage?
I don't know, I just fly the drone.

Why do black people only have nightmares?
We shot the only one with a dream.

What did the Boston Marathon bombers do that Hitler couldn't?
Ended a race.

What do children with cancer and jokes about children with cancer have in common?
They never get old.
People are se politically correct these days you can't even say black paint. Instead, you have to say "Leroy, paint my fence".

"How many babies does it take to screw in a lightbulb?"
"Apparently more than 61, because my basement is still pitch black."

Friend: "What's up?"
Me: "The death toll in Iraq."

Where did Annie go during the bombing?
Everywhere.
The last pizzas ordered to the Twin Towers were two large plains.

What do you get when you cut a baby with a razor?
I don't know about you, but I get an erection.
What's the difference between a baby corpse and a brick? You can't anally rape a brick.
I'm not racist! Racism is a crime and crime is for black people.
The dark jokes I have are so dark they stole my car!
How do you make a black nervous? Take him to an auction.
What do you call a black baby pig? A niglett.
What's the diffrence between a black guy and a pizza? A pizza can feed a family of four.
Can orphans eat at a family restaurant?

A woman visits the doctor as she has some abdominal pains and suspects she may be pregnant.
After her examination, the doctor comes out to see her: “Well, I hope you like changing nappies/diapers”.
She replies: “Oh my god am I pregnant, am I pregnant!?”
To which he responds: “No, you’ve got bowel cancer.”
A man went into a library and asked for a book on how to commit suicide. The librarian said: “Fuck off, you won’t bring it back.”

So a guy is walking with a young boy into the woods.
Boy “hey mister its getting dark out and I’m scared”
Man “how do you think I feel, I have to walk back alone”
Why can’t orphans play baseball? They don’t know where home is.
“I’m sorry” and “I apologize” mean the same thing. Except at a funeral.
I bet my friend $5 that he would drown in the lake. … A bittersweet victory.
Why do orphans like playing tennis? Because it’s the only love they get.
Did you know that pigeons can die from sex? At least the one I fucked did...
What's the difference between a black baby and a white baby? The black one smells like chicken nuggets when you torch it.

programming.name: Programming
jokes:
Q: Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas?

A: Because Oct 31 == Dec 25!

Eight bytes walk into a bar. The bartender asks, “Can I get you anything?”
“Yeah,” reply the bytes. “Make us a double.”

Q. How did the programmer die in the shower?
A. He read the shampoo bottle instructions: Lather. Rinse. Repeat.

How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?
None – It’s a hardware problem
There are only 10 kinds of people in this world: those who know binary and those who don’t.

“Knock, knock.”
“Who’s there?”
very long pause….
“Java.”
Programming is 10% science, 20% ingenuity, and 70% getting the ingenuity to work with the science.

Programming is like sex:
One mistake and you have to support it for the rest of your life.
Debugging: Removing the needles from the haystack.
A UDP packet walks into a bar, no one acknowledges him

What's the best part about TCP jokes?
I get to keep telling them until you get them.

What's the best thing thing about UDP jokes?
I don't care if you get them
What did the suicidal function say? "GOODBYE WORLD"
How do functions break up? "They stop calling each other!"
When is a function a bad investment? "When there's no return"
When do two functions fight? "When they have arguments"

How do you trigger a programmer?

Tell them arrays start at 1
Computers make very fast, very accurate mistakes.
Be nice to the nerds, for all you know they might be the next Bill Gates!
Artificial intelligence usually beats real stupidity.
Some things Man was never meant to know. For everything else, there’s Google.
The box said ‘Requires Windows Vista or better’. So I installed LINUX.
UNIX is basically a simple operating system, but you have to be a genius to understand the simplicity.
In a world without fences and walls, who needs Gates and Windows?
Unix is user friendly. It’s just selective about who its friends are.
Windows isn’t a virus, viruses do something.
If at first you don’t succeed; call it version 1.0.
My software never has bugs. It just develops random features.
I would love to change the world, but they won’t give me the source code.
Beware of programmers that carry screwdrivers.
If Ruby is not and Perl is the answer, you don’t understand the question.

food.name: Food
jokes:
Q: What do you call cheese that isn't yours?

A: Nacho cheese!

Q: Why couldn't the sesame seed leave the gambling casino?

A: Because he was on a roll.

Mushroom walks in a bar, bartender says "Hey you can't drink here."

Mushroom says "Why not, I'm a Fun-gi!"

Q: What do you call a fake noodle?

A: An Impasta.

Q: Why did the tomato blush?

A: Because it saw the salad dressing!

Q: Why don't eggs tell jokes?

A: They'd crack each other up!
Spoiler alert! The milk has been in the fridge for three weeks.
Subway is definitely the healthiest fast food available because they make you get out of the car.
Turning vegan is a big missed steak.
Smoking will kill you... Bacon will kill you... But,smoking bacon will cure it.
Ice hockey is basically just guys wearing knife shoes fighting each other with long sticks for the last Oreo.
It's always a good idea to make friends with babies. That's free cake once a year for a lifetime.
My wife says she is no longer buying junk food for the family because, "Everyone just eats it."
I ordered 2000 lbs. of chinese soup. It was Won Ton.
Just burned 2,000 calories. That's the last time I leave brownies in the oven while I nap.
My sister bet me I couldn't make a car out of spaghetti. U should of saw her face as I drove pasta.
I've just written a song about tortillas - actually, it's more of a rap.
I am on a seafood diet. Every time I see food, I eat it.
"No, thanks. I'm a vegetarian." is a fun thing to say when someone hands you their baby.
What do I say if a Mexican walks by me and daddy? Say "Here are the tacos."
Why did the students eat their homework? Because the teacher said that it was a piece of cake.
Did you hear about the guy who choked on a pretzel? He was very salty.
If you weigh 99 pounds and eat 1 pound of nachos you will be 1% nachos!

pickuplines.name: Pickup Lines
jokes: Your name must be Coca Cola, because you're so-da-licious
Excuse me? Do you work at Little Ceasars? Cuz Ur Hot And I'm Ready.
Baby, if you were a fruit you'd be a fineapple.
What has four legs and doesn’t have the most beautiful girl on it? My bed. Want to fix that?
Are u a sea lion? Because I want to sea u lion in my bed later!
Fuck me if I’m wrong, but dinosaurs still exist right?
Are you a trampoline because I want to bounce on you
Are you a mirror? Cause I can see myself inside you.
Do you want to go on a ate? I’ll give you the D later
If you jingle my bells, you’ll have a white Christmas
Roses are red grass is greener when i think about you i play with my wiener
You want to come over for Thanksgiving? Because I’m gonna stuff your turkey.
Is your face Mcdonalds? Cause im lovin it!
Are you a middle eastern dictator? Because there’s a political uprising in my pants
You look ill. You must be suffering form a lack of Vitamin ME.
Baby I’m like a firefighter I find them hot and leave them wet.
Girl you so hot, if you had to enter Antarctica you’d cause a melt down.
If you were a squirrel, would you help me bust a nut?
I’m not a hoarder but I really want to keep you forever.
Are you a Disney princess? Cause you’re cinderHella fine!
You like maths? Cause I want to ADD to you my life, SUBTRACT your clothes, DIVIDE your legs and MULTIPLY ourselves.
Are you from Russia? ‘Cause you’re russian my heart rate!
Girl, are those space pants? Cause your butt is out of this world!
8 Planets, 1 Universe, 1.735 billion people, and i end up with you.
Your smile is almost as big, warm, and lovely as my penis
Are you harembes enclosure? Cause i’ll drop a kid inside of you!

funfacts: The world’s oldest piece of chewing gum is over 9,000 years old!
A coyote can hear a mouse moving underneath a foot of snow.
Bolts of lightning can shoot out of an erupting volcano.
New York drifts about one inch farther away from London each year.
A U.S. dollar bill can be folded approximately 4,000 times in the same place before it will tear.
A sneeze travels about 100 miles per hour.
Earth has traveled more than 5,000 miles in the past 5 minutes.
It would take a sloth one month to travel one mile.
10% of the World’s population is left handed.
A broken clock is right two times every day.
According to Amazon, the most highlighted books on Kindle are the Bible, the Steve Jobs biography, and The Hunger Games.
Bob Marley’s last words to his son before he died were “Money can’t buy life.”
A mole can dig a tunnel that is 300 feet long in only one night.
A hippo’s wide open mouth is big enough to fit a 4-foot-tall child in.
Chewing gum while you cut an onion will help keep you from crying.
If you were to stretch a Slinky out until it’s flat, it would measure 87 feet long.
Al Capone’s business card said he was a used furniture dealer
There are more collect calls on Father’s Day than on any other day of the year.
Banging your head against a wall burns 150 calories an hour.
A crocodile can’t poke its tongue out.
It is physically impossible for pigs to look up into the sky.
Guinness Book of Records holds the record for being the book most often stolen from Public Libraries.
McDonalds calls frequent buyers of their food “heavy users.”
If you somehow found a way to extract all of the gold from the bubbling core of our lovely little planet, you would be able to cover all of the land in a layer of gold up to your knees.
The average person spends 6 months of their lifetime waiting on a red light to turn green.
The largest recorded snowflake was in Keogh, MT during year 1887, and was 15 inches wide.
You burn more calories sleeping than you do watching television.
There are more lifeforms living on your skin than there are people on the planet.
Southern sea otters have flaps of skin under their forelegs that act as pockets. When diving, they use these pouches to store rocks and food.
In 1386 a pig in France was executed by public hanging for the murder of a child.
One in every five adults believe that aliens are hiding in our planet disguised as humans.
If you believe that you’re truly one in a million, there are still approximately 7,184 more people out there just like you.
A single cloud can weight more than 1 million pounds.
A human will eat on average 70 assorted insects and 10 spiders while sleeping.
James Buchanan, the 15th U.S. president continuously bought slaves with his own money in order to free them.
There are more possible iterations of a game of chess than there are atoms in the known universe.
The average person walks the equivalent of three times around the world in a lifetime.
Men are 6 times more likely to be struck by lightning than women.
Coca-Cola would be green if coloring wasn’t added to it.
You cannot snore and dream at the same time.
A shrimp's heart is in it's head.
Rats and horses can't vomit.
Like fingerprints, everyone's tongue print is different.
People say "Bless you" when you sneeze because when you sneeze,your heart stops for a mili-second.
If you sneeze too hard, you can fracture a rib.
95% of people text things they could never say in person.
My creator is canadian
My creator is in IT
I am my creator's personnal project of his autumn 2017 semester
I am made entirely of JavaScript (including Node.js and JSON)
My creator is of asian origins

My creator has a youtube channel (which used to be quite active before he got a job. Unfortunately, he didn't have any more time with work and school to be active. However, he has never declared it officially "dead")
My name doesn't actually come directly from "intelligence". My creator and some of his friends in IT have named their group: Int elligents;
I used to be called "Get Rekt Bot" in reference to my creator's old IT group name "cout << 'Get Rekt' << endl;"
My creator's favorite programming language is JavaScript
I was made because my creator wanted to get some experience in Node.js
Jackpot! Here's a link to the server I was being tested on during development (if it still exists!): https://discord.gg/5tTvXzD

Some bots are management bots, others music bots or anything else. I'm not a specific type of bot. My creator made me to compile a bunch of these while trying to add a touch more than other bots. (such as music command being so extensive)

The 'queue' subcommand of the music command was the longest to code, although it is only about 10 lines of code. It was supposed to be simple, until my creator found out that asynchronous javascript exists the hard way. So he had to learn about it and try a bunch of different stuff to make 'queue' work.
Music is by far the biggest command I have, but don't get the wrong idea, I am not a music bot!
During my creation, my creator has been barely gaming because he would program me instead.
My creator takes his coffee with 2 creams and 1 sugar

My creator was not originally going to study in IT, but in science (to go in medecine)! In college, even if he had over 90% in chemistry and physics, he hated it! So he switched to IT to have over 95% instead doing what he loved (stats for 1st year only haha). Follow what you love!

The only reason I do not have a public Github repository like many other bots is because I was not originally going to be published publicly, so my owner didn't take care of comments and proper code standards. I look fantastic on the outside, but really, I'm a mess in the inside!
At the time of development, I am the biggest and longest personnal project my owner has made. (#2 is his website, #3 is a JavaScript wallpaper on wallpaper engine)

My creator's first programming language was JavaScript (HTML and CSS were learned first, but HTML is not a programming language and CSS... well, it's complicated and debated). He learned the basics with an iPhone app called L2Code JavaScript (Learn to Code JavaScript) by doing exercices. Pretty crazy when you think about it!
At the time of development, my creator hasn't had a single true course in JavaScript (the langage I'm made in). It was entirely self-thaught.
StackOverflow is the answer.
The latest my owner stayed up to program me was 5AM
I am responsible for many lost sleep hours of my creator

My creator isn't watching me consistently. He wrote algorithms so I can detect when I am in a crash loop and thaught me how to rewrite myself without his help so I can restart. However, in those events, I was likely forced to restore all settings (like prefix, admins, etc) to default values.
My creator can update existing commands without having to reboot me.
My owner has a command that I only obey to him where he can take many actions on me without having to abort me, such as leaving your server.
My owner almost deleted me completely mid-production while doing something wrong on Github
I was not originally planned to be released publicly
My owner can launch a command which basically puts me on lockdown from every command which is not launched by him. He refers it as the 'debug' mode.

Unless I am manually stopped by stopping my script, I will never stop running. I have several blocks of code implemented to the roots of my very own existing designed to catch many types of errors and treat them. In the event I don't, I reboot super quickly in order to try to preserve all data and avoiding corrupted data.
The longest part of creating me is mostly taking care of making sure the inputs you give me are valid. You wouldn't believe what you could do if those were not in place!
My profile picture was made by my creator. Not the most beautiful face, but at least there are no copyright issues!
My creator spent over 16 hours developping the way I structure data and 12 hours rewriting it a month later for a new structure that would be easier to keep the integrity of data

My creator had to set himself a release date where whatever happens, he would have to release me officially to the public. The reason for that is because he could easily see how my development would just never end with all the stuff he could do. So he set it to the end of his semester (Dec 21). Sometimes, you just have to move on!
My creator spent over 5 hours just trying to align and scale the text appropriately for memes

My creator has a special dev command to be able to control me from Discord without having to change my code, stop or reboot me. The amount of subcommands that command has is twice as big as the sum of all commands and subcommands available to the public!

5 weeks before my release, my creator found out that the data strucutre used to store your server's unique settings (JSON) was going to be problematic when multiple servers modify their settings. He changed it for them to be all in a local database (called enmap). He had to go through over 10 000 lines of codes to update the new structure and test all the commands and events.
The official server of Intellibot is more than just a simple server for my creator. It has many private channels for logging stuff that he can't see when he's away.
I give error reports every hour and log reports every 24h to my creator
There are two ways to get into my official server: pledge on patreon or find the secret within me!
The music command mostly relies on recursive callbacks
I am the project my owner made to self-teach himself on NodeJS
At the time of this fact, I am planned to release on December 21st 2017 if all goes well. Of course, it is only 4 weeks before release that major bugs appear!
I have a Twitter profile (Intellibot_Bot), a webpage (www.maxijonson.com/intellibot) and a Patreon page (www.patreon.com/intellibot). My owner really spoiled me!
Intellibot is also the name of an intelligent vaccum!
My webpage was made entirely in 8 hours! My owner rather spend time on my developpement rather than the other stuff xd

My creator can't actually stop me, he can only reboot me through a dev command. The only way to actually stop me is to stop my process on the Amazon server I'm on, which I really don't like the way it is done. It is sudden which makes me unable to do the usual stuff I do on a safe reboot.
My creator can pull my plug from his phone, so if I'm stuck in a crash loop, he'll be notified and he can shut me down for debug on the go!
The first command I had is the ping command

The meme command used to be so powerful that it would litterally make me stop doing anything (stopped playing music, stopped responding to commands... on ANY server). This alarming bug was found only 3 weeks before release. My creator was faced with 3 options: 
1. Create another bot which would send the meme to me which I would then send to you (which is really a big joke he used to make before, until it actually became a possibility)
2. Change de module used to make memes which he really didn't want to do because all the algorithm that took him 3 days to come up with was made with THAT module.
3. The one he went for: create a child process (which is essentially a program running separatly from the main one I am on) which would take care of making the memes on demand. He did not know a single thing about them, didn't even knew they really were possible. But he made it! Yet more experience in NodeJS!

When creating a meme, I launch a child process to make sure that I don't get slowed down by all the image calculations. So, making a meme is essentially very special, you meme has its very own process for about 1 second!

Since memes are running in a child process, it is very hard to collect error logs from it. (so hard I'm not actually collecting any because I don't have access to my logger in the child process) But, your input or sometimes the code can still generate errors. If those happen, I can't pin point where it happened, but I can define it using 4 exit codes:
Exit 1 - Image processing error (probably with the image provided to the module)
Exit 2 - You did something wrong (i.e: no meme name provided)
Exit 3 - Error in making the the child process (this was still implemented, just in case, but it should never trigger, EVER. If it does, something/someone is launching it)
Exit 4 - Couldn't send the meme, even if it was generated.
so many errors were found when my creator, all excited about a working command, showed it to some friends where it crashed.

The server I'm hosted on is ultra secured! If you know nothing about IT security, then you'll be surprised to know there's not even a password to access it, yet it is even more secured than if it did! The only way to access it is...... oh right, not supposed to talk about that, I'll let you guess!
If I haven't received a server upgrade since release, it costs roughly 72 cents per day to host me!

Many programming concepts were translated from C++, which my creator learned in class, to JavaScript, which was self-taught. For example: the concept of recursivity learned in C++ was used in music for finding the video either by link, save name or video name without having to make those 3 types separate. They're in the same block of code, the type you use gets detected easily using the concept.

The music command used to have a download subcommand, which would download the .mp3 file. 2 weeks before release, my owner removed it because he forgot about it being illegal to download copyright content. He actually spent about 5 hours trying to determine if the video was legal or not to be downloaded by checking if it was licensed. He decided to take the subcommand down after realizing there was no real way to find out if it was legal or not, since even non-copyrighted material (like NCS music) is still a form of copyright, just without consequences. My owner will always remember the entire day he spent making that subcommand and the pain as a programmer it was to have to tear it up.......
Arrays start at 0
The official server has a hidden channel that is mostly consisted of 'Intellibot up and ready' because that's what I say to this channel everytime I boot up and I booted up A LOT during development!

You may (or not) see places where I talk about V2. V2 was made during the beta phase. It represents a huge change to the data structure used to store data. It went from using a JSON based data structure, which is representing each servers as individual objects. But this type of structure was later proved to be very fragile when multiple servers would affect it. So my owner spent a full week updating the data structure everywhere. Now, I use an ENMap based data structure, which keeps everything in a single database, minimizing corruption.

My creator tried his best to make his code adaptive. What I mean by adaptive is that almost no data is "hard coded". Everything is either calculated or fetched. So adaptive that even himself is not hard coded in my code when checking for dev commands. I still fetch info on him to know if he is a developer as I would do if there were more than just one! This makes results unique, like putting your name somewhere.

When doing error handling, my creator goes into this mode where he thinks everyone using me is trying to break me. He tries his best to put his mind inside someone like that and think of all the possibilities that could go wrong, especially when data is going into the database.
The last command made before the official release was the info command
On the day I was released, my creator had the flu and massive fever, but that didn't stop him from finishing the touch-ups on me to make sure I was ready!

cin and cout are from which library?
What is the keyword for creating a function?
What operator deallocates a block of memory?
What operator allocates memory for an object, returning a nonzero pointer to that object?
What operator increments a value by 1?
What operator returns the rest of a division?
What kind of conditionnal operator is the OR (||) operator?

```js
const num = 6
const r = num % 3 == 0 ? "rick" : "morty"
console.log(r)
```
What operator destroys an object (symbol)?
What kind of for loop (for __ loop) loops through an object's property?
What is the name of the most powerful user which doesn't require sudo to launch administrative commands and is often highly recommended not to use it without purpose?
What library contains file input and output objects and methods?
What is the name of the "double ended queue" container (the object/variable)?
How to you add an element to an array?
What company made JavaScript?
What is the last name of the person who wrote the JavaScript language?
How many days did it take to write JavaScript?
What was JavaScript called before it was called JavaScript?
What is the variable type of 'Null'?
